text.div:
Care Plan Document Codes

A value set of LOINC document type codes for Care Plan documents.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    52521-2Overall Plan of Care/​Advance Care Directives
    18776-5Plan of Care

name: Care Plan Document Codes
description: A value set of LOINC document type codes for Care Plan documents.
